DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Phase-defined complete sequencing of the HLA genes by next-generation sequencing
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: We applied long-range PCR to amplify six HLA genes (HLA-A, -C, -B, DRB1, -DQB1, and PB1) followed by Nextera DNA Sample Preparation Kit and multiplex paired-end reads (2 x 250 bp) sequencing with the MiSeq sequencer.
DESCRIPTOR.CENTER_PROJECT_NAME: Phase-defined complete sequencing of the HLA genes by next-generation sequencing
